column4: anyone here? i have a complete noob question.  I installed the quake 4 binary and now all i have to do is copy the pak files from the retail cdroms.  i copied cd1 pak files no problem but when i insert cd2 it says i dont have permission to view the files. how do i fix this?
well, it was a guess anyway
where's your cdrom drive mounted? usually it's under /media in ubuntu
figure that out and use it instead of /mnt/cdrom0
that's probably why you can't use it normally... you should probably try this:
actually, just try my previous suggestion using /media/cdrom0 instead of /mnt/cdrom0
do you see the query window from me?
no, I can't. You probably need to register your nick
hmm, still can't see you even in DCC-Chat
